title: Toxicity is fun!
body:
Anyone else think it's funny when your ally/enemy team is losing because they're flaming eachother?

Heck its just so god dang FUNNY!

  Sometimes ill ping my team missing or point out KDAs just to stir things up.
Maybe slap the enemy team with a hard "?" or an "ff?" In all chat whenever they screw up.

Btw i want to point out how powerful the Question Mark is.
"?" That can tilt someone hard enough to win/lose games.

replies.body:
I think there is a massive difference between trash talking and being toxic. 

What is very strange to me is how often people flame their own teammates, which more often than not causes them to play worse than better, especially when they get into a chat war, stopping to type in response to each other instead of paying attention to the game. It even starts to tilt the other players on your team because they just want everyone to shut up and play. 

On the other hand, tilting your opponents is more of a strategy. If they are upset and raging at each other, your team gets an advantage. 

So I wouldn't agree with you it's fun to tilt your own team, but tilting the enemy team is good.
